title: How to Reopen Your YouTube Account

steps.title: Click on the help resources link at the bottom of the page.
steps.content: Click on the help resources link at the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Click on "Fix account Problem" beside the bar.
steps.content: Click on "Fix account Problem" beside the bar.

steps.title: Click "unable to sign in to youtube".
steps.content: Click "unable to sign in to youtube".

steps.title: Click on "i know my email address and password but i can't sign in".
steps.content: Click on "i know my email address and password but i can't sign in".

steps.title: Click on "I'm having a different sign in issue".
steps.content: Click on "I'm having a different sign in issue".

steps.title: Click on the link " Contact our sign-in support team".
steps.content: Click on the link " Contact our sign-in support team".

steps.title: Fill out all the blank boxes.
steps.content: Fill out all the blank boxes.

steps.title: Click on "This is my Personal youtube account" when "Tell us more about the account that you are having problems signing into" is asked .
steps.content: Click on "This is my Personal youtube account" when "Tell us more about the account that you are having problems signing into" is asked .

steps.title: Select "my youtube account has been closed" under the "Please select the issue you're experiencing ".
steps.content: Select "my youtube account has been closed" under the "Please select the issue you're experiencing ".

steps.title: If you see an error upon opening your account click yes if none click no.
steps.content: If you see an error upon opening your account click yes if none click no.

steps.title: State in the box what you error you saw.
steps.content: State in the box what you error you saw.

steps.title: Click submit and wait for the sign-in trouble support help you through email.
steps.content: Click submit and wait for the sign-in trouble support help you through email.
